Title:
Phyllactinia chubutiana: a new species of Erysiphales from
Patagonia (Argentina)
Abstract:
Phyllactinia chubutiana collected in the arid Patagonian
steppe, parasite on leaves of Lycium chilense (Solanaceae), is proposed
as new species. A replacement name, Ovulariopsis insolita is given to
the related anamorph known as Oidium insolitum.
